description: create or cancel a virtual instance in SoftLayer

domain.description: Domain name to be provided to a virtual instance

cpus.description: Count of cpus to be assigned to new virtual instance

dedicated.description: Flag to determine if the instance should be deployed in dedicated space

private_vlan.description: VLAN by its Id to be assigned to the private NIC

hourly.description: Flag to determine if the instance should be hourly billed

ssh_keys.description: List of ssh keys by their Id to be assigned to a virtual instance

hostname.description: Hostname to be provided to a virtual instance

os_code.description: OS Code to be used for new virtual instance

state.description: Create, or cancel a virtual instance. Specify "present" for create, "absent" to cancel.

post_uri.description: URL of a post provisioning script to be loaded and executed on virtual instance

memory.description: Amount of memory to be assigned to new virtual instance

tags.description: Tag or list of tags to be provided to a virtual instance

image_id.description: Image Template to be used for new virtual instance

wait_timeout.description: time in seconds before wait returns

private.description: Flag to determine if the instance should be private only

public_vlan.description: VLAN by its Id to be assigned to the public NIC

wait.description: Flag used to wait for active status before returning

datacenter.description: Datacenter for the virtual instance to be deployed

disks.description: List of disk sizes to be assigned to new virtual instance

instance_id.description: Instance Id of the virtual instance to perform action option

local_disk.description: Flag to determine if local disk should be used for the new instance

nic_speed.description: NIC Speed to be assigned to new virtual instance
